code: import React,{useState,useEffect,useCallback}from"react";import"./App.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const API_URL="http://localhost:5000";function App(){const[message,setMessage]=useState("");const[name,setName]=useState("");const[userData,setUserData]=useState(null);const[error,setError]=useState("");const fetchMessage=useCallback(async()=>{try{const response=await fetch("".concat(API_URL,"/user?name=").concat(name));const data=await response.json();setMessage(data.message);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching message:",error);}},[name]);const fetchUser=async userId=>{try{setError("");const response=await fetch("".concat(API_URL,"/users/").concat(userId));if(!response.ok){throw new Error("User not found");}const data=await response.json();setUserData(data);}catch(error){setError(error.message);setUserData(null);}};useEffect(()=>{fetchMessage();},[name,fetchMessage]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"App",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"App-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Hello User App"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"input-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter your name"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:message}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-buttons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>fetchUser(1),children:"Get User 1"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>fetchUser(2),children:"Get User 2"})]}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"error",children:error}),userData&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"User Information"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Name:"})," ",userData.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Email:"})," ",userData.email]})]})]})});}export default App;
